actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to create a safe harbor for finders and private placement brokers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Unlocking Capital for Small Businesses Act of 2018

summary.text:
Unlocking Capital for Small Businesses Act of 2018 

This bill (1) requires the Securities and Exchange Commission to establish registration requirements for private-placement brokers and finders that are no more stringent than those imposed on crowdfunding portals, and (2) otherwise modifies provisions related to private-placement brokers and finders.

titles.title: Unlocking Capital for Small Businesses Act of 2018
To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to create a safe harbor for finders and private placement brokers, and for other purposes.
